bitbucket-resource-default-reviewers.body:
resource "bitbucket_default_reviewers" "$1" {
    # reviewers - (Required) A list of reviewers to use.
    reviewers = ""

    # repository - (Required) The name of the repository.
    repository = ""

    # owner - (Required) The owner of this repository. Can be you or any team you
    owner = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
bitbucket-resource-default-reviewers.description: Provides support for setting up default reviewers for your repository.

bitbucket-resource-hook.body:
resource "bitbucket_hook" "$1" {
    # events - (Required) The event you want to react on.
    events = ""

    # description - (Required) The name / description to show in the UI.
    description = ""

    # url - (Required) Where to POST to.
    url = ""

    # repository - (Required) The name of the repository.
    repository = ""

    # owner - (Required) The owner of this repository. Can be you or any team you
    owner = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
bitbucket-resource-hook.description: Provides a Bitbucket hook resource. This allows you to manage your webhooks on a repository.

bitbucket-resource-repository.body:
resource "bitbucket_repository" "$1" {
    # owner - (Required) The owner of this repository. Can be you or any team you
    owner = ""

    # name - (Optional) The name of the repository.
    name = ""

    # scm - (Optional) What SCM you want to use. Valid options are hg or git.
    scm = ""

    # is_private - (Optional) If this should be private or not. Defaults to `true`.
    is_private = ""

    # website - (Optional) URL of website associated with this repository.
    website = ""

    # language - (Optional) What the language of this repository should be.
    language = ""

    # has_issues - (Optional) If this should have issues turned on or not.
    has_issues = ""

    # has_wiki - (Optional) If this should have wiki turned on or not.
    has_wiki = ""

    # project_key - (Optional) If you want to have this repo associated with a
    project_key = ""

    # fork_policy - (Optional) What the fork policy should be. Defaults to
    fork_policy = ""

    # description - (Optional) What the description of the repo is.
    description = ""

    # Exported Attributes
}
bitbucket-resource-repository.description:
Provides a Bitbucket repository resource. This resource allows you manage your repositories such as scm type, if it is
private, how to fork the repository and other options.
